subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Dario Franchitti holds only a 3-point lead over Scott Dixon in the standings entering today’s IndyCar Series season finale at Chicagoland Speedway in Joliet, Ill. But Franchitti will start from the pole, after winning his third pole of the season yesterday.Sam Hornish Jr. and Hélio Castroneves qualified second and third. Tony Kanaan, the only other driver with even an outside shot at the title, was fourth. Dixon was sixth.
